abstract_ssm: This collection includes various materials spanning 1891 to 1896 and relating to Reverend David Young.  Reverend David Young (1719-1752) was born in Southold, Long Island and graduated from Yale College in 1741.  He was ordained in either Setauket or Brookhaven, Long Island in 1742.
subject_ssm: Presbyterian Church -- New York (State) -- Long Island

subject_sim: Presbyterian Church -- New York (State) -- Long Island
